imdb.plot outline: Living abroad can be a curse or a blessing. Playfully reflecting on misunderstandings, surprise encounters and the vagaries of an expat life, MONA LISA COWBOY tells the universal story of wanderers, living between comedy and drama as they straddle cultures. The backstory of the YUKATA COWBOY series, MONA LISA COWBOY is a dramatic comedy about two estranged Chinese twins brought together by a Japanese-American cowboy in Paris.
imdb.title: Mona Lisa Cowboy
plot: The backstory of the YUKATA COWBOY series, MONA LISA COWBOY is a dramatic comedy about two estranged Chinese twins brought together by a Japanese-American cowboy in Paris.::Atsushi Ogata & Sian Evans

Living abroad can be a curse or a blessing. Playfully reflecting on misunderstandings, surprise encounters and the vagaries of an expat life, MONA LISA COWBOY tells the universal story of wanderers, living between comedy and drama as they straddle cultures. The backstory of the YUKATA COWBOY series, MONA LISA COWBOY is a dramatic comedy about two estranged Chinese twins brought together by a Japanese-American cowboy in Paris.::Atsushi Ogata & Sian Evans
